channel.title: Only Sending One Out Of Multiple Messages. Help Please!

item.title: Only Sending One Out Of Multiple Messages. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Gilbert Gilbert
item.description:
@Gilbert wrote:

For some reason this is only sending that last message. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

else if (command.startsWith("reset") && playerRights == 3){ { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[NOTICE] SERVER RESET! ALL LOG OFF FOR 30 SECONDS@@@@@@@@@@@"; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[NOTICE] SERVER RESET! ALL LOG OFF FOR 30 SECONDS@@@@@@@@@@"; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[NOTICE] SERVER RESET!
